title: Required Windows Vista fonts, incl. Clear Type----for re-install
description:
I recently had to clean-out my fonts in Vista and cross my fingers that I didn&#039;t delete something vital. Well, turns out that the fonts that I saved (and consequently backed up in this RAR) was just what Vista needs to keep rolling. (Yes this RAR has all required clear type fonts)

***If you have other specific programs which require their own fonts (usually Corel software, QuickBooks, Adobe software and some others) you will want to talk to Google before deleting all your fonts to start over/consolidate.

***There are some "shortcuts" to program specific fonts included in this RAR, if you get an error when installing them, just disregard. As I just said, they are &#039;program&#039; specific, not &#039;Windows Vista&#039; specific.

***While you may use these fonts in SUPPLEMENT for WinXP/2k, you should NOT rely on these fonts as required replacements for WinXP/2k. These are intended as bare bones for Windows Vista ONLY!


  ---FYI: Vista will automatically stop you from killing fonts that are currently in use (nice failsafe), just a heads up for when you are emptying your fonts directory and get errors from Windows telling you that you need permissions to perform that action on a specific font....
